import React from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import { BackgroundImageContainer, ContentContainer, MenuItemContainer } from './menu-item.styles'; import './menu-item.styles.scss' const MenuItem = ({ title, imageUrl, size, history, match, linkUrl }) => ( history.push(`${match.url}${linkUrl}`)}>

{title.toUpperCase()}

SHOP NOW ) export default withRouter(MenuItem)
